name: Twitter-Classroom-Web App
tagline: Really small little app, perfect for use in the classroom. Downloads a PDF of your (fake) tweet... students love it.
body:
### What is this about.
This is a little app I created for students to use in the classroom. Ideally it is used at the end of a lesson so that students can leave a 'tweet' about what they have learned. I'd love to collaborate with other educators on this, I think it could be really interesting to hear peoples ideas.

### Authors and Contributors
Tristan Kirkpatrick - 2015

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the app? Check [contact me](http://www.twitter.com/tristan_ictcs) and Iâ€™ll help you sort it out.

www.ictcomputerscience.org
